header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.subtitle: In case you have more questions, feel free to reach out to us.

faqs.question: What is LogiXJunction App?
faqs.answer: LogiXJunction is a technology-first logistics platform that simplifies freight movement across India. It connects businesses with reliable transporters, ensuring smarter, faster, and more transparent freight operations.

faqs.question: How do I use LogiXJunction App?
faqs.answer: Simply download the app, sign up as a shipper or transporter, choose your vehicle type, enter pickup and drop details, and confirm your booking. The app provides real-time tracking and updates throughout the journey.

faqs.question: How do I book a tempo/mini truck/bike or intercity courier services online from the LogiXJunction app?
faqs.answer: Select your required vehicle category on the app, add shipment details, compare prices, and book instantly. Our digital platform ensures secure payments and transparent pricing.

faqs.question: Does LogiXJunction transport between cities?
faqs.answer: Yes, LogiXJunction supports both intracity and intercity freight movement, enabling businesses to expand their reach seamlessly.

faqs.question: What are the items that are prohibited by LogiXJunction?
faqs.answer: Items such as hazardous chemicals, explosives, illegal goods, perishable food without proper storage, and restricted items under government law cannot be transported.

faqs.question: What are the charges for goods transportation services by truck and two-wheelers?
faqs.answer: Charges depend on vehicle type, distance, load capacity, and route. The app provides an upfront price estimate before booking, ensuring cost transparency.

faqs.question: Does LogiXJunction provide Packers and Movers services?
faqs.answer: Currently, LogiXJunction focuses on business freight and courier logistics. Packers and Movers services may be available in select regions or via partner networks.

faqs.question: What types of goods does LogiXJunction transport?
faqs.answer: We transport a wide range of goods, including retail products, FMCG items, e-commerce parcels, raw materials, and industrial supplies (except restricted/prohibited items).

faqs.question: How long does it take to transport goods via LogiXJunction?
faqs.answer: Delivery time depends on the distance, type of shipment, and service chosen (intra-city or intercity). The app provides an estimated time before confirmation.

faqs.question: How does an API Integration with LogiXJunction work?
faqs.answer: LogiXJunction offers APIs that integrate directly with business systems, enabling automated shipment booking, tracking, and reporting.

faqs.question: How does an API integration solve business problems?
faqs.answer: API integration helps businesses reduce manual processes, optimize logistics costs, gain real-time visibility, and improve supply chain efficiency.

faqs.question: What vehicle categories are available via the APIs?
faqs.answer: Through our APIs, businesses can access multiple vehicle options, including two-wheelers, tempos, mini trucks, and heavy commercial vehicles, depending on shipment needs.
